text: "Workin' for a Livin'" is a song by American country music artist Garth Brooks. It was released in December 17, 2007 as the second single from third compilation album The Ultimate Hits. ==Music video== The music video and premiered on January 17, 2008 on CMT. It debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of February 7, 2008. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Garth Brooks songs
title: Workin' for a Livin' (Garth Brooks song)
